name: git-terminal
description: Custom command snippets, history, and status bar shortcuts for terminal workflows.

title.description: Status bar button title and terminal name

reuse.description: Override terminal reuse behavior for this snippet

os.description: Limit snippet to specific operating systems (win32|darwin|linux)

gitTerminal.customTerminalsButtonLabel.description: Status Bar button label that opens the saved custom commands Quick Pick

gitTerminal.cursorSymbol.description: Marker inside snippets for manual cursor placement before finishing the command

gitTerminal.showPreviewForCustomTerminal.description: Show a modal preview of the final command before running

gitTerminal.reuseTerminalByTitle.description: Reuse existing terminal windows matched by snippet title

gitTerminal.customHistorySize.description: Number of recent custom commands to remember

gitTerminal.confirmDangerousCommands.description: Ask for confirmation when a command appears dangerous (e.g., git reset --hard)

gitTerminal.pinLastCustomTerminal.description: Show a separate Status Bar button for the last executed custom command

gitTerminal.pinLastCustomTerminalLabelPr.description: Prefix icon/label for the pinned last custom command button

gitTerminal.showStatusBar.description: Show the saved command status bar button
